attributes.additional_details: The parliament needs to show some more compassion to those fleeing danger and hate.
attributes.background:
With the current migration bill fears of human rights might be overlooked.
I want the government to look at, rethink and try and give some compassion to those moving away from danger and fleeing war and hate.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Stop the Illegal Migration Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634311

If you want the Government to do something different you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
